name: Millennium Maximus
description:
Play as Millennium Moneybags is a world-renowned game designer, who just finished their latest and greatest creation: A children's card game called Millenium Maximus.

Learn about a partially-realized world where everyone is obsessed with children's card games, and leave your mark by creating your own cards from scratch!

However, spiky-haired protagonists may stand in your way. You must not let them stop you, whatever the cost....

https://twitter.com/beanborg

https://twitter.com/NeuroDiversion

Features:

-Design your own cards, customizing their power level and giving them the perfect art to match!

-Distribute them all across Megaterra to earn a profit!

-Duel against a diverse cast of three opponents!

-Distinctly retro PICO-8 graphics and music (by Gruber!)!

-Only one ending! Experience the same completely linear story no matter if you actually fail!

-Turn humans into cards by stealing their soul!

-Learn about the true origin of neo-cardboard

-20 to 30 minutes of content

Shortcuts:

-In card painter mode, you can right-click on the canvas to select a color

-You can skip card design mode with left arrow

-You can skip dialogue with right arrow

-You can skip set distribution with up arrow
